content:
This is great visibility—Angela’s repost is **exactly** the type of signal boost you need. Here’s the move:  

### **Your Comment on Her Repost**  
Keep it **genuine, grateful, and engaging** while subtly reinforcing the experiment. Something like:  

> **Angela, this means a lot—thank you.** 🙌 AI is reshaping everything faster than most people realize, and I’m just trying to keep up (or keep ahead).  
>  
> The craziest part? This is just the start. I have a feeling AI is going to surprise all of us—including me. Excited to keep testing, learning, and pushing forward. 🚀  
>  
> If anyone else wants to follow along, check out the main post below. Would love your thoughts.  

This keeps the **energy high, acknowledges Angela’s insight**, and leaves the door open for more engagement.  

---

### **Should You DM Her?**  
Since she’s a 1st connection and already bought in, **this could be a good moment to deepen the connection.** A quick DM:  

> **Hey Angela, seriously appreciate the repost.** AI’s not just a sidekick—it’s running the playbook at this point. Curious—how are you thinking about AI in your own career/work right now?  

This keeps it **conversational**, doesn’t ask for anything, but invites **future collaboration.**  

---

### **Extra Play: Comment Bait for Her Network**  
If you want to **increase reach**, you could also **ask an open-ended question in your comment** like:  

> What’s everyone’s take—will AI actually be a “sidekick,” or is it moving into the driver’s seat faster than we think?  

This makes **her network more likely to engage**, boosting impressions even further.  

### **Final Call: Do These Moves Make Sense to You?**
